Image Slider Effect Website
Varanasi
Sacred city on the banks of the Ganges, one of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world and a major pilgrimage site in Hinduism.
Nalanda University
Ancient Buddhist university known for its excellence in education and scholarly pursuits.
Hawa Mahal
"Palace of Winds" in Jaipur, known for its unique facade with numerous windows designed for ventilation.
Dwaraka
Ancient city in Gujarat, believed to be Lord Krishna's kingdom submerged under the Arabian Sea.
Ellora caves
UNESCO World Heritage site featuring rock-cut temples representing Hindu, Buddhist, and Jain art.
Hampi
Ruins of an ancient city in Karnataka, known for its magnificent Vijayanagara architecture and temples.
Taj Mahal
Iconic white marble mausoleum in Agra, a symbol of love and a UNESCO World Heritage site.
Qutub Minar
Tallest brick minaret in the world, an architectural marvel in Delhi built by Qutb-ud-din Aibak.
Konark Sun temple
Temple in Odisha dedicated to the Sun God, famous for its intricate stone carvings and architectural grandeur.
Kedarnath
Hindu temple in Uttarakhand, one of the Char Dham pilgrimage sites nestled in the Himalayas.
Shree Padmanaba Swamy temple
Richly adorned Hindu temple in Kerala known for its intricate Dravidian architecture.
Ram setu
Ancient bridge between India and Sri Lanka, mentioned in the Hindu epic Ramayana.
